system.description:
Your zealous ferocity increases, making you even more dangerous. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Versatile Exploration feature also applies to herald Divine Lessons, and whenever you choose a Developed Talent or Divine lesson, you can choose from any of the three lists.

  • When you use Divine Smite, if you are not raging, you may enter a rage as part of the smite, provided you have Rage uses remaining.

  • If you use your Divine Smite on a creature while you are already raging, it must make a Strength saving throw against your maneuver DC or have its AC reduced by 2 for the next minute. Multiple instances of this cannot further reduce the AC value, but do reset its duration.

  • You learn the following Furious Critical option, which does not count against your Furious Critical options known: @UUID[Item.1q10CvpkNRLPgEvN]{Cascading Wrath}.

source.name: Thematic Toolkit: Judge, Jury, and Executioner
